name: Garbo (Salty Breakfast)
description:
REQUIRES 2 PS4 CONTROLLERS

CONTROLS 

  • MOVE - LEFT STICK
  • THROW - X [CROSS]
  • PICK UP - O [CIRCLE]
  • CLEAN ITEM - [SQUARE]

Garbo is a 2 player coop puzzle game.

The game is about 2 bins named Garbo and Garba that have to recycle dirty objects that have been put into the recycling and then must sort them after being cleaned into the correct bins.
